about_the_game:
Resurrect is a horror roguelite card game where you engage in battles by deploying creatures, using instant cards, and executing powerful combos. Choose from various decks, each offering distinct playstyles including Mech, Demon, Mage, and Dragon.


Each starter deck includes a unique companion creature that evolves through 4 stages as you fight. If used at the right time, it can be the deciding factor between winning or losing a battle!

Build and refine your deck by exploring the map, finding new cards, and interacting with enigmatic characters.

Gameplay

  • Fight by placing your creatures, using instant cards, and maximizing card effects to create deadly combos
  • Choose from several decks, each with its unique playstyle, such as Mech, Demon, Mage, Dragon, and more
  • Every starter deck includes a loyal buddy that gains experience and evolves as you progress in battles
  • Build your deck by exploring the map, finding or trading cards
  • Navigate the map to encounter strange creatures and mysterious individuals who can either assist or deceive you!

Features

  • 220+ Unique cards
  • 7+ Creature types
  • 60+ Unique card effects that can be combined to execute combos
  • 6+ Starter decks, each with a unique companion creature featuring 4 stages of evolution
  • 12+ Unique points of interest on the map
  • 8+ Optional meta-progression items to give you an additional edge as you play the game
